Product Description
Specifications
Customer Reviews (0)

Handy filling orifice in lid for easy filling
Electronic cartridge change display: BRITA MEMO
Dishwasher-safe up to 50°C (exception: lid)
XL version for larger demand, total volume: 3.5 L, filtered water: 2.0 L
Including 1x Maxtra cartridge
